price: Nokorε sε, na yεka kyerε wͻn sε Awurade foforͻ biara nni hͻ ka Nyankopͻn ho a, na wɔreyε ahomasoͻ.
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innahum kānū idhā qīla lahum lā ilāha illā al-lahu yastakbirūna
